These are the stages data often goes through during a research project, but they
are also how we think about data going from idea to impactful information.  
  
<br>  
  
![Data lifecycle (*Click to enlarge*)](img/image-stewardship-data-lifecycle.svg){width="100%" fig-alt="Diagram showing the data lifecycle"}
  
<br>  
  
At each stage of the data lifecycle, we've highlighted some data stewardship actions
that can be taken.  These are not comprehensive though.
